topic.title: Map Hypertext Markers
topic.shortdesc: Converts the content of Hypertext markers into usable elements in the current file or book.

body.p: cross-refconversionxref conversionThis command relies on proper setup of parameters in Hypertext section of the fm2dita.ini file. If you are converting “gotolink” Hypertext markers, set up the GotolinkHref parameter with the required format. If you are converting “newlink” Hypertext markers and want them converted into fm-data-markers, set the NewlinkToData parameter to “1”. If you are converting “message URL” Hypertext markers, those will convert into @href attributes in external xref elements by default; no setup is necessary.
This command must be run after the EDD has been applied.
